document.full_text: tiny cameras probing the rubble of an idaho mine collapse have found no sign of a miner missing there for a week, as search teams tunneled on through solid rock trying to reach him, officials said on thursday.
document.title: camera images yet to capture missing idaho miner
lines_and_colors: tiny cameras probing the rubble of an idaho mine collapse have found no sign of a miner missing there for a week, as search teams tunneled on through solid rock trying to reach him, officials said on thursday.
